meaningMnemonic: Whatever people <radical>say</radical> to you will be carved by a <radical>blade</radical> into your <radical>heart</radical>. Sounds cruel, but it's a way to make you <kanji>recognize</kanji> their power.
readingMnemonic: Having their words carved into your heart makes you <kanji>recognize</kanji> the authority of many people. But the only one you could ever truly <kanji>acknowledge</kanji>, is <reading>Nin</reading>tendo (にん).
